title: Asteroids: Multiplayer
notes: Steam has 1 review (no score). SteamDB shows 64.08% positive (2 reviews); tiny sample keeps score mid‑60s. Steam store lists 1 user review, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, and keyboard/gamepad support.
raw_comment: Cooperative wave-based asteroid and enemy ship blasting game. Large ships and stations can be controlled by multiple players. No hard limit for number of players. Shared screen.
